CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 19, 1955, pg. 21 reads: "Star Time - Sports celebrities were very much in evidence at the William Penn Hotel Sunday night at the annual Dapper Dan sports banquet. in photo on the left, Post Gazette Sports Editor Al Abrams, right, presents a trophy to Lenny Moore of Penn State as other standout gridders look on. On the far left is Don Bailey, Penn State quarterback.  Next to Moore is Allen Ameche, the nation's No. 1 football player, and Pitt's Henry Ford... Ford has been signed by the Cleveland Browns-Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: College football players, from left: Penn State quarterback Don Bailey, Penn State football player Lenny Moore receiving award, Allen Ameche, University of Pittsburgh player Henry Ford, and Post-Gazette sports editor Al Abrams, in William Penn Hotel for Dapper Dan banquet
